Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and traces of black-painted Greek letters.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393893) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393893)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (fig.29)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Gr. 3 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
